mapper.select: SELECT id AS inquiry_detail_id, mat_desc, mat_id, mat_model, mat_no , mat_type_id, mat_type_name, process_cost, process_up, quantity , tax_cost, total_price, up FROM pc_inquiry_sub WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiry_id} AND status = 1

SELECT id AS inquiry_detail_id, mat_desc, mat_id, mat_model, mat_no , mat_type_id, mat_type_name, process_cost, process_up, quantity , tax_cost, SUM(total_price) AS total_price, up FROM pc_inquiry_sub WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiry_id} AND status = 1
